Method metamerise()

Creates new metamers

Usage

metamer_list$metamerise(
  stop_if = n_tries(10),
  name = "",
  keep = NULL,
  verbose = interactive()
)

Returns

A metamer_list object with more metamers.

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.
